name: solidity-challenge
description: Create and deploy an ERC20 token and a staking contract that will distribute rewards to stakers over time.
author: Nathan

scripts.build: npm run clean && npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile --config hardhat.config.js
scripts.test: npm run build && npx hardhat test --config hardhat.config.js ./test/*.js
scripts.test-staker: npm run build && npx hardhat test --config hardhat.config.js ./test/Staker.js
